name: WISNews10
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from WIS News 10 Columbia, South Carolina within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Columbia, South Carolina area from the WIS Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
